004
005package edu.wpi.first.math.kinematics;
006
007import static edu.wpi.first.units.Units.Meters;
008
009import edu.wpi.first.math.MathUtil;
010import edu.wpi.first.math.interpolation.Interpolatable;
011import edu.wpi.first.math.kinematics.proto.DifferentialDriveWheelPositionsProto;
012import edu.wpi.first.math.kinematics.struct.DifferentialDriveWheelPositionsStruct;
013import edu.wpi.first.units.Distance;
014import edu.wpi.first.units.Measure;
015import java.util.Objects;
016
017/** Represents the wheel positions for a differential drive drivetrain. */
018public class DifferentialDriveWheelPositions
019    implements Interpolatable<DifferentialDriveWheelPositions> {
020  /** Distance measured by the left side. */
021  public double leftMeters;
022
023  /** Distance measured by the right side. */
024  public double rightMeters;
025
026  /** DifferentialDriveWheelPositions struct for serialization. */
027  public static final DifferentialDriveWheelPositionsStruct struct =
028      new DifferentialDriveWheelPositionsStruct();
029
030  /** DifferentialDriveWheelPositions struct for serialization. */
031  public static final DifferentialDriveWheelPositionsProto proto =
032      new DifferentialDriveWheelPositionsProto();
033
034  /**
035   * Constructs a DifferentialDriveWheelPositions.
036   *
037   * @param leftMeters Distance measured by the left side.
038   * @param rightMeters Distance measured by the right side.
039   */
040  public DifferentialDriveWheelPositions(double leftMeters, double rightMeters) {
041    this.leftMeters = leftMeters;
042    this.rightMeters = rightMeters;
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * Constructs a DifferentialDriveWheelPositions.
047   *
048   * @param left Distance measured by the left side.
049   * @param right Distance measured by the right side.
050   */
051  public DifferentialDriveWheelPositions(Measure<Distance> left, Measure<Distance> right) {
052    this(left.in(Meters), right.in(Meters));
053  }
054
055  @Override
056  public boolean equals(Object obj) {
057    return obj instanceof DifferentialDriveWheelPositions other
058        && Math.abs(other.leftMeters - leftMeters) < 1E-9
059        && Math.abs(other.rightMeters - rightMeters) < 1E-9;
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public int hashCode() {
064    return Objects.hash(leftMeters, rightMeters);
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public String toString() {
069    return String.format(
070        "DifferentialDriveWheelPositions(Left: %.2f m, Right: %.2f m", leftMeters, rightMeters);
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  public DifferentialDriveWheelPositions interpolate(
075      DifferentialDriveWheelPositions endValue, double t) {
076    return new DifferentialDriveWheelPositions(
077        MathUtil.interpolate(this.leftMeters, endValue.leftMeters, t),
078        MathUtil.interpolate(this.rightMeters, endValue.rightMeters, t));
079  }
080}
